name: The Only One Bullet
description:
The only one bullet

A 2d puzzle platformer made for the GMTK Jam 2019

Unfortunately  Nothing happened as I planned... :(

Photoshop stopped working, Unity too... I lost most of my work

I didn't finish the game and there's no more time... maybe sometime in the future..

Just wanted to share the Idea with you, I hope you like it  :)

........

Warning: I didn't even complete the tutorial section.... So this is a prototype more than a game '^^ ....

#gmtkjam
